  • Constructor Details

    • Planets

      public Planets()
      Constructs an instance of the Planets class. The constructor initializes the cardName property to the class name of the instance.

  • Method Details

    • setStepsBack

      public void setStepsBack(int stepsBack)
      Sets the number of steps the player has chosen to move backward.
      Parameters:
      stepsBack - the number of steps to move back. Must be a non-negative integer representing the steps to rewind.

    • setAvailablePlanets

      public void setAvailablePlanets(List<Planet> availablePlanets)
      Sets the list of available planets.
      Parameters:
      availablePlanets - a list of Planet objects to be set as the available planets

    • getAvailablePlanets

      public List<Planet> getAvailablePlanets()
      Retrieves the list of available planets.
      Returns:
      a list of Planet objects that are currently available.

    • getStepsBack

      public int getStepsBack()
      Retrieves the number of steps back.
      Returns:
      the number of steps back as an integer.

    • getPlayerPlanet

      public Map<String,Planet> getPlayerPlanet()
      Retrieves the mapping of player identifiers to their respective assigned planets.
      Returns:
      a Map where the keys are Strings representing player identifiers and the values are Planet objects representing the planets assigned to those players.

    • setCurrPlanet

      public void setCurrPlanet(Planet planet)
      Sets the current planet for the player or game context.
      Parameters:
      planet - the Planet object to be set as the current planet

    • toClientCard

      public ClientCard toClientCard()
      Converts the current object to an instance of ClientCard.
      Specified by:
      toClientCard in class AdventureCard
      Returns:
      a new ClientCard instance initialized with the current object's properties.

    • getFirstState

      public CardState getFirstState()
      Retrieves the first state from the list of card states.
      Specified by:
      getFirstState in class AdventureCard
      Returns:
      the first CardState object in the list

    • play

      public void play(PlayerChoicesDataStructure playerChoices) throws UnknownStateException
      Executes the appropriate logic based on the current state of the game and the player's choices.
      Specified by:
      play in class AdventureCard
      Parameters:
      playerChoices - The data structure containing the player's choices, which may include the chosen planet index, updates to storage, or selected cargo cube storage.
      Throws:
      UnknownStateException - Thrown when the current state is unrecognized or invalid for this method.
